short_summary: Indigenous Services Canada requires services related to Microsoft Dynamics CRM and Power Platform

full_summary:
#  **Dynamics PSIB TBIPS SBR Services**

###Project Overview###
 

Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) requires services related to Microsoft Dynamics CRM and Power Platform. Services include a business transformation of existing case management solutions, implementation of new Dynamics and Power Platform solutions, departmental onboarding to new Dynamics-based and Power Platform solutions, integration with existing departmental systems, modernization and evolution of existing Dynamics and Power Platform solutions, and advancement of and support for the adoption of common solutions. 

###Request for Proposal Overview and Background Information**

A competitive request for proposals has been issued for the provision of Dynamics PSIB TBIPS SBR Services. This solicitation is restricted to TBIPS Holders who have been qualified for Tier 1 Services in the National Capital Region (NCR), within the Informatics Professional Services category (GSIN Code D30 2A).

###Proposer Briefing Session ID#

In accordance with section 5.5.2 of subsection 5.5 of the procurement strategy document, ISC will not hold a Proposer Briefing Session, however, address any clarifications or questions to the below contact instead:

###Contact Information###
 
**Contact:**
Chretien, Karine
**Email:** [karine.chretien@canada.ca](mailto:karine.chretien@canada.ca) 
**Phone:** 873-354-6817

The requirement’s anticipated delivery period is not specified. Bidders are expected to bring all required personnel and equipment to the work site. Proposals must be submitted by December 13, 2022 at 2 p.m. Eastern Time.
